MAIN_PAGE.SEO_TITLE: Freddy Sanabria - Web Developer and Graphic Designer from Paraguay
MAIN_PAGE.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Creating unique web applications and stunning designs for your brand. I take care of creating the web page and design you need.

DESCRIPTION.PART_4: from Ciudad Del Este, Paraguay. Specialized in creating web applications with the visual identity that

JOB_1.TITLE: Freelance Graphic Designer and Developer
JOB_1.DESCRIPTION: Starting my programming career with small not very complex projects and at the same time I continue to create content for various companies as a graphic designer, for social networks, advertising, etc. In addition to also editing videos for social networks and programming content for companies that need it.

JOB_2.TITLE: Graphic Designer and Video Editor - iStore
JOB_2.DESCRIPTION: Responsible for creating managing the daily content of everything related to the visuals of the company, on social networks, website, advertising, etc. I made sure to generate the best possible content to attract customers.

PROJECT_1.TITLE: ElectroFrio - 2024 (Work in progress...)
PROJECT_1.DESCRIPTION: A landing page for an important air conditioning company in the region where I live, taking care of the UI, UX design, responsive, SEO and more.

PROJECT_2.TITLE: Flesh CMS - 2024 (Work in progress...)
PROJECT_2.DESCRIPTION: A CMS dashboard to control products, categories, details and other aspects of an E-Commerce, developed for iStore.

PROJECT_3.TITLE: iStore - 2024
PROJECT_3.DESCRIPTION: E-Commerce for an Apple store in Paraguay, where I was in charge of the visual part, the responsive, the SEO and more. The project is not finished yet.

PROJECT_4.TITLE: Just a Resume - 2024
PROJECT_4.DESCRIPTION: A free tool to create resumes for people who don't have much time to write, with a very simple and easy to use design.

SOCIALMEDIA.TITLE: Social Media
SOCIALMEDIA.DESCRIPTION: Some of the designs I have created for social media, such as banners, posts, etc. These designs are made to promote products, services, or events.

PHOTOMANIPULATION.TITLE: Photo Manipulation
PHOTOMANIPULATION.DESCRIPTION: Some of the photomontages I have created for different projects, such as image editing, photomontages, etc.
